thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Juniper Pharmaceuticals Announces ‍Extension Of Supply Agreement For Crinone

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Juniper Pharmaceuticals Announces ‍Extension Of Supply Agreement For Crinone
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Juniper Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* JUNIPER PHARMACEUTICALS ANNOUNCES 4.5-YEAR EXTENSION THROUGH 2024 OF CRINONE® SUPPLY AGREEMENT WITH MERCK KGAA, DARMSTADT, GERMANY
* JUNIPER PHARMACEUTICALS INC - ‍EXTENSION OF SUPPLY AGREEMENT FOR CRINONE WITH AFFILIATE OF MERCK KGAA
* JUNIPER PHARMACEUTICALS INC - ‍AMENDED AGREEMENT EXTENDS SUPPLY TERM AN ADDITIONAL 4.5 YEARS AND AT LEAST THROUGH TO DECEMBER 31, 2024​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
